articles.title: Meta to spend $65bn on AI goals, Zuckerberg says
articles.author: Business Day
articles.summary: Meta Platforms plans to spend as much as $65bn this year to expand its artificial intelligence (AI) infrastructure. As part of the investment, Meta will ramp up hiring for AI experts. This will be a defining year for AI, according to CEO Mark Zuckerberg.

articles.title: Singapore Court Approves WazirX Recovery Plan Amid $230M Hack Fallout
articles.author: Bitcoin World
articles.summary: Singapore High Court has approved Zettai Pte Ltd's proposal to restructure WazirX after it suffered a $230 million hack linked to North Korea's Lazarus Group. The court granted a 16-week moratorium on legal action for the company.

Chinese investors have approached the Sindh High Court. articles.title: South Hills Coin Club to celebrate 65th anniversary
articles.author: Jon Andreassi
articles.summary: The South Hills Coin Club will celebrate its 65th anniversary with its annual show next month. It will take place at Crowne Plaza Hotel and Suites Pittsburgh South from 10 to 5 p.m. on February 1. 40 coin dealers will be on hand. Vendors will be set up in the event space. Parking and admission are free. There are hourly door prizes and a raffle.
